================================================================
Document Header
Copy and paste this tag in the <head> section of your HTML.
================================================================
<script>
    var adsmtag = adsmtag || {};
    adsmtag.cmd = adsmtag.cmd || [];
    (function() {
        var script = document.createElement('script');
        script.async = true;
        script.type = 'text/javascript';
        script.src = 'https:' + '//rmb-adsembler.netdna-ssl.com/mnemonics/adsm.macro.2ff5ddea-9034-463c-a0e5-768a261eaca7.js';
        var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        node.parentNode.insertBefore(script, node);
    })();
</script>

================================================================
Document Body
Copy and paste these tags in the <body> section of your HTML.
Place each tag in the desired location of the associated <div>.
================================================================
<div id="cncpt-lb1_skn"></div>

<div id="cncpt-lb3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-lb4_meg"></div>

<div id="cncpt-lb5"></div>

<div id="cncpt-lb6"></div>

<div id="cncpt-ovl"></div>

<div id="cncpt_rec1"></div>

<div id="cncpt_rec2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rec3"></div>

<div id="cncpt_rec4"></div>

<div id="cncpt_rec5"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rec6"></div>

<div id="cncpt-sky1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-sky2"></div>

<div id="cncpt_sky3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-sky4"></div>

<div id="cncpt_sky5"></div>

<div id="cncpt-outstream"></div>

<div id="cncpt-tab_rec1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-tab_rec2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-tab_rec3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-tab_rec4"></div>

<div id="cncpt-tab_rec5"></div>

<div id="cncpt-tab_rec6"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob4"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob5"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob6"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob7"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob8"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob9"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob10"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob11"></div>

<div id="cncpt-mob_outstream"></div>

================================================================
Display methods
These methods needs to be called if a tag is dynamically
inserted into <body>.


Each call to the method must be added using the command queue
and manually refreshed.
================================================================
adsmtag.display('cncpt-lb1_skn', 'def-lb1');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-lb3', 'def-lb3');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-lb4_meg', 'def-lb4');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-lb5', 'def-lb5');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-lb6', 'def-lb6');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-ovl', 'def-ovl');

adsmtag.display('cncpt_rec1', 'def-rec1');

adsmtag.display('cncpt_rec2', 'def-rec2');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-rec3', 'def-rec3');

adsmtag.display('cncpt_rec4', 'def-rec4');

adsmtag.display('cncpt_rec5', 'def-rec5');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-rec6', 'def-rec6');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-sky1', 'def-sky1');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-sky2', 'def-sky2');

adsmtag.display('cncpt_sky3', 'def-sky3');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-sky4', 'def-sky4');

adsmtag.display('cncpt_sky5', 'def-sky5');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-outstream', 'def-outstream');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-tab_rec1', 'def-tab-rec1');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-tab_rec2', 'def-tab-rec2');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-tab_rec3', 'def-tab-rec3');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-tab_rec4', 'def-tab-rec4');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-tab_rec5', 'def-tab-rec5');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-tab_rec6', 'def-tab-rec6');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob1', 'def-mob1');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob2', 'def-mob2');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob3', 'def-mob3');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob4', 'def-mob4');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob5', 'def-mob5');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob6', 'def-mob6');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob7', 'def-mob7');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob8', 'def-mob8');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob9', 'def-mob9');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob10', 'def-mob10');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob11', 'def-mob11');

adsmtag.display('cncpt-mob_outstream', 'def-mob_outstream');

================================================================
If only one tag is inserted dynamically use the below example.
================================================================
adsmtag.cmd.push(function () {
    adsmtag.display('cncpt-lb1_skn', 'def-lb1');
    // manual call to refresh
    adsmtag.refresh(['cncpt-lb1_skn']);
});

================================================================
If multiple tags are inserted at the same time, they must all be
refreshed at the same time to ensure ad server targeting works.
================================================================
adsmtag.cmd.push(function () {
    adsmtag.display('cncpt-lb1_skn', 'def-lb1');
    adsmtag.display('cncpt-sky1', 'def-sky1');
    adsmtag.display('cncpt-sky2', 'def-sky2');
    // manual call to refresh
    adsmtag.refresh(['cncpt-lb1_skn', 'cncpt-sky1', 'cncpt-sky2']);
});
